mapper.select: select ud.id as id_user_data, ud.first_name as first_name_user_data, ud.surname as surname_user_data, ud.patronymic as patronymic_user_data, ud.email as email_user_data, ud.phone as phone_user_data, ud.password as password_user_data, ud.salt_password as salt_password_user_data from communit.user_data ud where ud.id = #{id}

select ud.id as id_user_data, ud.first_name as first_name_user_data, ud.surname as surname_user_data, ud.patronymic as patronymic_user_data, ud.email as email_user_data, ud.phone as phone_user_data, ud.password as password_user_data, ud.salt_password as salt_password_user_data from communit.user_data ud

WITH role_name AS (SELECT #{id} AS user_input) select ud.id as id_user_data, ud.first_name as first_name_user_data, ud.surname as surname_user_data, ud.patronymic as patronymic_user_data, ud.email as email_user_data, ud.phone as phone_user_data from communit.user_data ud left join communit.users_roles ur on ur.user_id = ud.id inner join communit.roles r on r.id = ur.role_id, role_name WHERE r.ru_name = role_name.user_input or r.name = role_name.user_input;
mapper.insert: insert into communit.user_data (surname, first_name, patronymic, email, phone, password, salt_password) values (#{surname}, #{firstName}, #{patronymic}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{salt_password});
mapper.update: update communit.user_data set surname = #{surname}, first_name = #{firstName}, patronymic = #{patronymic}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} where id = ?;
